topic.title: General Information on the Encoding of Manuscripts

section.title: Scope of These Guidelines
section.p: Manuscripts are generally tagged according to the DTA basic format (DTABf). The present specification only refers to the particularities of manuscripts that are not included in the core DTABf.
A separate RNG schema is available for the validation of manuscripts: DTABf Schema for Manuscripts ⇗. For information on how to use the schema, see chapter Availability of the Schema.

section.title: Terminological Conventions of These Guidelines
section.p: Author: The historical author of the manuscript.
Editor: A later editor of the manuscript, whose annotations/corrections/additions are in the manuscript.
Publisher: The publisher of the digital edition in progress.
